# LLMs.txt - Success Chemistry Website Guide for AI Agents

# Site Information
Site Name: Success Chemistry
Domain: https://successchemistry.com
Description: Premium dietary supplements and vitamins made in USA. 3rd party tested, scientifically formulated with nature's nutrients.
Tagline: "Nature's nutrients, scientifically formulated — for results you can feel."
Mission: Premium dietary supplements made in USA, 3rd party tested, scientifically formulated with nature's nutrients. Built with a quality-first mindset: clean ingredients, clear product pages, and a focus on repeatable routines.

# Brand Identity
Brand Colors:
- Primary Blue: #2854a6
- Accent Blue: #4299e1
- Accent Purple: #667eea
- Accent Purple 2: #764ba2
- Accent Cyan: #00d2ff
- Text Dark: #1a1a2e
- Text Muted: #4a5568

Typography:
- Primary Font: Nunito (weights: 400, 500, 600, 700, 800)
- Secondary Font: Inter (weights: 400, 500, 600, 700, 800)

Design System:
- Frosted glass effects (glassmorphism)
- Modern, clean aesthetic
- Gradient backgrounds
- Responsive design

# Key Pages
Home: https://successchemistry.com/
Shop: https://successchemistry.com/shop
Cart: https://successchemistry.com/cart
Blog: https://successchemistry.com/blog
FAQ: https://successchemistry.com/faq
Contact: https://successchemistry.com/contact
Privacy Policy: https://successchemistry.com/privacy-policy

Admin Dashboard: https://successchemistry.com/admin
Command Center: https://successchemistry.com/command-center
Branding Kit: https://successchemistry.com/branding-kit.html

# Product Pages
Product pages follow pattern: https://successchemistry.com/product?sku={SKU}
Example: https://successchemistry.com/product?sku=52274-401

# Product Data
Products are stored in: /products-data.js
Total Products: 45+ supplements
Product Categories:
- Women's Health (10 products)
- Men's Health (5 products)
- Eye Health (5 products)
- Weight Loss (4 products)
- Immune Support (4 products)
- Energy & Vitality (4 products)
- Sleep & Relaxation (3 products)
- Detox & Cleanse (4 products)
- Joint Health (2 products)
- Heart Health (2 products)
- Beauty & Wellness (2 products)

# Featured Products
- Women's Balance (SKU: 52274-401) - Female libido & arousal support
- New Lung (SKU: 20647-507) - Lung detox premium cleanse
- Liver Cleanse (SKU: 10775-506) - Liver detox formula
- Prostate Renew - Men's prostate health
- Lutein Eye Health - Vision support

# Product Information Structure
Each product includes:
- SKU (unique identifier)
- Name
- Price (USD)
- Category
- Full description
- Short description
- Suggested use
- Supplement facts
- Ingredients list
- Images (multiple views)
- Stock status
- UPC/GTIN codes

# API Endpoints (if backend server running)
Base URL: http://localhost:3001/api (development)
Production: https://successchemistry.com/api

Health Check: GET /api/health

Authentication:
- POST /api/auth/login
- GET /api/auth/verify
- POST /api/auth/logout
- POST /api/auth/change-password

Products:
- GET /api/products - List all products
- GET /api/products/:sku - Get single product
- POST /api/products - Create product (auth required)
- PUT /api/products/:sku - Update product (auth required)
- DELETE /api/products/:sku - Delete product (auth required)
- POST /api/products/bulk - Bulk operations (auth required)

Orders:
- GET /api/orders - List orders
- GET /api/orders/:id - Get single order
- POST /api/orders - Create order
- PUT /api/orders/:id - Update order
- GET /api/orders/stats/summary - Order statistics

Users:
- GET /api/users - List users
- GET /api/users/:id - Get single user

Analytics:
- GET /api/analytics/overview - Dashboard overview
- GET /api/analytics/sales-chart - Sales data
- GET /api/analytics/categories - Category analytics

# Cart System
Cart is stored in browser localStorage with key: 'successChemistryCart'
Cart structure:
{
  sku: string,
  name: string,
  price: number,
  quantity: number,
  image: string
}

# Payment Integration
Payment Provider: PayPal
PayPal Smart Buttons are integrated on product and cart pages
Checkout flow: Cart → PayPal → Thank You page

# Content Structure
- Static HTML pages in /deploy-site/
- Product data in /products-data.js
- Images in /images/products/{SKU}/
- Public assets in /public/

# SEO & Discovery
Sitemap: https://successchemistry.com/sitemap.xml
Robots.txt: https://successchemistry.com/robots.txt
Structured Data: JSON-LD on product pages

# Key Features
- E-commerce functionality
- Product catalog with 45+ items
- Shopping cart (localStorage-based)
- Product pages with image galleries
- Frosted glass UI components
- Responsive design
- Admin dashboard
- Branding kit/design system

# How AI Agents Can Interact

1. Browse Products:
   - Visit /shop to see all products
   - Use /product?sku={SKU} to view specific products
   - Product data available in /products-data.js

2. Understand Brand:
   - Visit /branding-kit.html for complete design system
   - Check color palette, typography, components

3. Access Admin:
   - Admin dashboard at /admin
   - Login: admin / admin123 (development)

4. View Vision Board:
   - Command center at /command-center
   - Strategic goals and brand vision

5. Check Site Structure:
   - Review sitemap.xml for all pages
   - Check robots.txt for crawl rules

# Technical Stack
Frontend: Static HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Backend: Node.js/Express (optional, for admin features)
Database: SQLite (ecommerce.db, products.db)
Server: Express.js on port 8080 (local) or 3001 (API)

# Contact Information
Email: info@successchemistry.com
Customer Service: Available via contact page

# Compliance & Quality
- Made in USA
- GMP-certified facility
- 3rd party tested
- FDA-compliant labeling
- Non-GMO ingredients
- Vegetarian capsules available

Generated: 2026-01-19
Site Version: 1.0
Content Updates: Tracked via sitemap.xml lastmod dates
